attributes.action: Overrule Herefordshire council's decision to axe the Hereford Western Bypass.
attributes.additional_details: Hereford is gridlocked right throughout the day. The only settlement on the A49 not to have a bypass. The city is choking on on fumes. Please help the people of Hereford get a much needed bypass.
attributes.background: Please step in and help the city of Hereford get a bypass. There is overwhelming support for a road to relieve traffic through the city.

rejection.details:
You could raise your issue with a local councillor who represents you. You can use this page to find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them:
https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
